sentence.value: Klimuk made three flights into space.
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Klimuk made three flights into space.

sentence.value: Klimuk attended the Leninski Komsomol Chernigov High Aviation School and entered the Soviet Air Force in 1964.
sentence.annotated-sentence: Klimuk attended the [[Leninski|Le%C5%84inski,_Belarus]] [[Komsomol|Komsomol]] Chernigov High [[Aviation School|Flight_training]] and entered [[the Soviet Air Force|Soviet_Air_Forces]] in [[1964|1964]].
